targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  status,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = 'prod'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
  status,
  count() /(200 / 1000)
FROM
  default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1707801636) AND date <= toDateTime(1707801920)
  AND env = 'prod'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  toInt16(status/100)*100 as status,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = 'prod'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t,
  toInt16(status/100)*100 as status,
  count() /(2000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1706129716) AND date <= toDateTime(1706133316)
  AND env = 'prod'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t

panels.title: Requests Per Second By Status Group

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
WITH busy_canisters AS (
  SELECT
    ic_canister_id
  FROM
    $table
  WHERE
    date >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
    AND env = '${env}'
    AND ic_canister_id != ''
  GROUP BY
    ic_canister_id
  ORDER BY
    count() DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  ic_canister_id,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND ic_canister_id GLOBAL IN (SELECT ic_canister_id FROM busy_canisters)
GROUP BY
  t,
  ic_canister_id
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
WITH busy_canisters AS (
  SELECT
    ic_canister_id
  FROM
    default.http_access
  WHERE
    date >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
    AND env = 'prod'
    AND ic_canister_id != ''
  GROUP BY
    ic_canister_id
  ORDER BY
    count() DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
  ic_canister_id,
  count() /(60000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1706435477) AND date <= toDateTime(1706521877)
  AND env = 'prod'
  AND ic_canister_id GLOBAL IN (SELECT ic_canister_id FROM busy_canisters)
GROUP BY
  t,
  ic_canister_id
ORDER BY t

panels.title: Requests Per Second By Canister ID (top10 over last 30min)

panels.description: Shows count of requests per URI/HOST/IC_CANISTER_ID

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
   request_uri, http_host, ic_canister_id, count(*)
FROM
   $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
GROUP BY http_host, request_uri, ic_canister_id
ORDER BY count(*) DESC
LIMIT 20
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
   request_uri, http_host, ic_canister_id, count(*)
FROM
   default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1707877625) AND date <= toDateTime(1707899225)
  AND env = 'prod'
GROUP BY http_host, request_uri, ic_canister_id
ORDER BY count(*) DESC
LIMIT 20

panels.title: Identify the target

panels.description: Shows overview over hashed source addresses and their geo location

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    remote_addr_hashed,
    geo_city_name,
    geo_country_name,
    geo_country_code,
    count(*)
FROM
   $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
GROUP BY remote_addr_hashed, geo_city_name, geo_country_code, geo_country_name
ORDER BY count(*) DESC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    remote_addr_hashed,
    geo_city_name,
    geo_country_name,
    geo_country_code,
    count(*)
FROM
   default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1707877900) AND date <= toDateTime(1707899500)
  AND env = 'prod'
GROUP BY remote_addr_hashed, geo_city_name, geo_country_code, geo_country_name
ORDER BY count(*) DESC
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
    ic_canister_id, 
    count(*) as num_requests
FROM $table
WHERE 
    $timeFilter
    AND env = '${env}'
GROUP BY ic_canister_id
ORDER BY num_requests desc 
limit 10
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 
    ic_canister_id, 
    count(*) as num_requests
FROM default.http_access
WHERE 
    date >= toDateTime(1707827980) AND date <= toDateTime(1707838780)
    AND env = 'prod'
GROUP BY ic_canister_id
ORDER BY num_requests desc 
limit 10
